GeneDef.label: hyper cell instability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need much less metabolic energy to stay alive, at the cost of greatly-reduced stability in their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: super cell instability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need much less metabolic energy to stay alive, at the cost of greatly-reduced stability in their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: extreme cell instability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need much less metabolic energy to stay alive, at the cost of greatly-reduced stability in their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: notable cell instability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need less metabolic energy to stay alive, at the cost of reduced stability in their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: minor cell instability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need less metabolic energy to stay alive, at the cost of reduced stability in their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: minor cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need more metabolic energy to stay alive, in exchange for an increase in stability of their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: mild cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need more metabolic energy to stay alive, in exchange for an increase in stability of their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: notable cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need more metabolic energy to stay alive, in exchange for a large increase in stability of their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: major cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need more metabolic energy to stay alive, in exchange for a large increase in stability of their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: extreme cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need more metabolic energy to stay alive, in exchange for an extremely large increase in stability of their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: super cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need more metabolic energy to stay alive, in exchange for an extremely large increase in stability of their cell-replication machinery.
